actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to assist in reducing crime and the danger of recidivism in the District of Columbia by requiring speedy trials in criminal cases in the District of Columbia courts.
short_title: District of Columbia Speedy Trial Act

summary.text: District of Columbia Speedy Trial Act - Amends the District of Columbia Code to establish procedures and time limits to facilitate the speedy trial of criminal cases. Provides for: (1) the dismissal of charges against an individual if indictments are not filed within a specified time; and (2) the dismissal of an indictment if the individual is not brought to trial within a specified time.

titles.title: District of Columbia Speedy Trial Act
A bill to assist in reducing crime and the danger of recidivism in the District of Columbia by requiring speedy trials in criminal cases in the District of Columbia courts.
